text:
SwissQuant.cc | Switzerland, Zurich | ONSITE | Java Developer // Lead Frontend (React) |

For these roles, you have to speak A2-B1 German and you should already live in Switzerland.

We are an ETH-spinoff and we do risk management calculations for private banks. In 2005 a law was introduced that all banks have to declare risks to their clients. Big banks solved this in-house; small, private banks could not do it, and then Swissquant solved this problem. Now, we are 50 people consisting of quant, math, finance, and tech people.

Here the formal job ads:

- Frontend https://jobs.swissquant.com/en/?Job=29144

- Java backend https://jobs.swissquant.com/en/?Job=19933

If you want to join us, write us:

jobs+hn@swissquant.cc
